channel.title: golf on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in golf on FinanClub

item.title: Hot Summer: The Bloomberg Open, Americas Edition
item.description: Bloomberg Open, Americas Edition The Bloomberg Open, Americas Edition is a new golf tournament that will be held in July 2023. The tournament will be played at the TPC Boston in Norton, Massachusetts. The field will include some of the top golfers in the world, including Dustin Johnson, Brooks Koepka, and Justin Thomas.

item.title: PGA Golfers Are Now Told to Love LIV After Forgoing Its Millions
item.description: PGA Tour and LIV Golf in Battle for Future of Professional Golf The PGA Tour and LIV Golf are engaged in a battle for the future of professional golf. The PGA Tour has banned players who have competed in the LIV Golf Invitational Series, while LIV Golf has poached some of the biggest names in the sport with lucrative contracts.
